name: #Dual Broadside Integration
desc: Mirrors the ship's starboard armaments to port at no additional OP cost. Note that this is not accounted for in the flux stats displayed in the refit screen.

name: Integrated Broadside Batteries
desc: This ship has built-in batteries of macrocannons, while they can't be removed or directly replaced, they can potentially be equipped with different types of ammunitions.

name: Macrobatteries: Stygies Shells
desc:
Changes the ship's built-in macrocannon batteries to fire heavy adamantine-reinforced stygies shells.

Increases shell damage and weight but decreases shell speed and adds inaccuracy.

name: Macrobatteries: Hecutor Shells
desc:
Changes the ship's built-in macrocannon batteries to fire Hecutor-Pattern plasma rounds.

Switches the damage type to energy and increases shell speed.

name: Macrobatteries: Pyros Shells
desc:
Changes the ship's built-in macrocannon batteries to fire melta-charged Pyros shells.

Changes the damage type to High Explosive.

name: Macrobatteries: Disruptor Shells
desc:
Changes the ship's built-in macrocannon batteries to fire disruptor shells.

Reduces base damage but adds EMP damage.

name: Macrobatteries: Staravar Laser Battery
desc: Turns the ship's built-in macrocannons into batteries of powerful lasers dealing high Energy damage.

name: Macrobatteries: Shard Cannons
desc: Turns the ship's built-in macrocannon batteries into xenotech shardcannons that create almost no flux.

name: Macrobatteries: Atomic Shells
desc:
Changes the ship's built-in macrocannon batteries to fire atomic warheads.

Massively increases shell damagebut decreases shell speed and adds inaccuracy.

name: Reactive Hull
desc: The ship slowly repairs lost hull.

name: Light Integrated Broadside Batteries
desc: This ship has built-in batteries of macrocannons, while they can't be removed or directly replaced, they can potentially be equipped with different types of ammunitions.

name: Novacannon
desc:
This ship has a built-in imperial novacannon under its prow, a devastating artillery cannon, firing explosive shells at relativistic speeds.

By default the novacannon is of the comparatively ubiquitous Mars-pattern, dealing high Kinetic damage, but the ship can also be equipped with other types of novacannons.

name: Novacannon: Ryza Shells
desc: Changes the ship's built-in novacannon to fire Ryza-Pattern Plasma shells that explode in an even larger radius than other types of novacannon rounds and deal high Energy damage.

name: Novacannon: Jovian Shells
desc: Changes the ship's built-in novacannon to fire Jovian-Pattern Vortex shells that are capable of ripping apart the very weave of reality, dealing massive damage to a single target.

name: Novacannon: Lathe Shells
desc: Changes the ship's built-in novacannon to fire Lathe-Pattern Gravitic shells, that deal high Energy damage and pull ships in a large area towards the point of impact.

name: Variable Torpedo Tubes
desc:
This ship has built-in heavy torpedo tubes.

By default they fire plasma torpedos, dealing heavy energy damage.

With access to the right technology however, they can be armed with other types of torpedos.

name: Torpedos: Melta Warheads
desc:
Changes the ship's built-in torpedo tubes to fire melta torpedos.

Switches damage type to High Explosive.

Note that these stat changes are not shown in the refit screen!

name: Torpedos: Vortex Warheads
desc:
Changes the ship's built-in torpedo tubes to fire vortex torpedos.

They deal devastating Energy damage but have very limited ammo capacity.

Note that these stat changes are not shown in the refit screen!

name: Torpedos: Barrage Warheads
desc:
Changes the ship's built-in torpedo tubes to fire barrage torpedos.

They split into many submunitions, each dealing moderate Energy damage.

Note that these stat changes are not shown in the refit screen!

name: Torpedos: Seeking Warheads
desc:
Changes the ship's built-in torpedo tubes to fire seeking torpedos.

They seek their target but deal reduced damage.

Note that these stat changes are not shown in the refit screen!

name: Armored Prow
desc: The ship's prow is heavily armored and has its own pool of health separate from the main hull.

name: Spore Clouds
desc: The ship is surrounded by swarms of semiintelligent acidic spores that shield it from harm and attack enemy ships and ordnance in close proximity.

name: Drake Wings
desc: Drake Wing animation.

name: Flame Aura
desc: Flame Aura for Daemon Engines

name: Prismatic Aura
desc: Prismatic Aura for Screamers

name: Hellforged
desc:
This ship was constructed or extensively modified by servants of chaos.

Chaos Marks applied to this ship are 50 percent more effective.

name: Alien Targeting Core
desc: Extends the range of ballistic and energy weapons by %s.

name: Mark of Tzeentch
desc:
The ship is marked by the lord of change.

Energy weapon and fighter damage is increased by %s.

name: Warp Beasts
desc: The ship is surrounded by horrors of the warp that occasionally fire bursts of flame at neargy enemies.

name: Mark of Khorne
desc:
The ship is marked by the lord of slaughter.

Weapon range is reduced by %s but all damage is increased by %s.

%s

name: Mark of Nurgle
desc:
The ship is marked by the lord of decay.

Increases hull by %s and reduces EMP damage taken by %s but decreases top speed by %s.

name: Ark of Pestilence
desc:
The ship is covered in a thick cloud of spores and warp-borne pestilence.

Enemy ships in close range are infected with pestilence, continually taking light hull damage and infecting others around them.

name: Mark of Slaanesh
desc:
The ship is marked by the lord of excess.

Increases movement speed by %s and reduces weapon flux generation by %s but decreases hull by %s.

name: Macrobatteries: Hives of Nurgle
desc: Turns the ship's built-in macrocannon batteries into diseased hives.

name: #Heavy Ballistics Integration
desc: Reduces the ordnance point cost of large ballistic weapons by %s.
short: Reduces ordnance point cost of large ballistic weapons.
